review: work extremely well, but I do notice i can interfere with my magic jack signals and that can make the phone call unclear.
author: ftk

review: The best thing since wifi! I love my Chromecast. Makes viewing everything from my mobile device so much easier!
author: Sham

review: I bought it thinking it would work with my Prime movies...but unless I am missing something, (which is possible..lol)...it doesn't.
author: smd

review: Easy to use- step by step set up- works for hulu- crackle- and pandora great- connects to netflix by can not watch netflix- but problem is on behalf of netflix- not chromecast- still use and enjoy
author: Julie Ricci

review: For $35 one cannot argue that you are getting a great value in this product.  I just bought one, and am buying more for all my TV's.  We use it all the time everyday.
author: Brad Harris "Brad the Dad"

review: Great product.  basically turns your tv into a smart tv for a fraction of the price.  we canceled cable after we got this and now only pay for internet.  highly recommend.
author: William D. Switzer

review: very satisfied with this purchase, it is everything I expected
author: edwin collado

review: Works perfectly.  Another plus for Google.
author: Paul Lindorf "Leaving MS behind"
